subject: [R] help with memory problem in SystemFit
body:
Hi - I encounter two problems with SystemFit. I have a matrix of 20 variables (380000 observations each). I am trying to fit using "2SLS" in Systemfit because I want to be able to simulate new observations with the resulting model. The first problem I found is that it ran out of memory given that I have 2GB of RAM. How can I circumvent this? Can I do some mixing or bootstrapping with small sample each time instead?Another problem is I got system is computationally singular when I reduce the size of observation to 100000 instead of 380000. Any help would be appreciated. I think my variables are not really well correlated to that extent. adschai
